import getRoute from "../Router"; function Contact(){ const handleOtherSelect = (e)=>{ document.getElementById('other_topic').style.visibility = e.target.id === 'other' ? 'visible' : 'hidden'; } const handleSend = (e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); console.log(window.location.pathname) } return(

Contact us

We are pleased to hear from You regarding any matter!




Or send us an e-mail at contact@codeahead.com.

); } export default Contact;
